column3:
â€œGreat Stain!

Be warned: you will get munchies and become stupidly lazy. 

Smoked a bowl with a couple of friends,.. ended up going through 4 XL pizzas, content with relaxing on couch and watching stupid random movies and enjoying them. (Kentucky Fried chicken). 

Its really easy to pass out after smoking this strain. Knocked us all out, woke up hungry as hell.

Do not recommend smoking in the morning or afte...â€

â€œExceptionally Strong. Looking for a clean indica that can make you numb, no pain just relaxation. I find that it's harder and harder these days to find a pure Indica, without some hybridized effects. Just totally hits my body at first I don't notice it at all. Then all of sudden I noticed I am relaxed, if you want that 60's vibe of all peace and no war this is a pure representation of that moment frozen in time. Afgh...â€

â€œSolid 8, started smoking and instantly felt tingley.kept smoking got major munchies,ate dominos.loaded another bowl sat on the  couch was way to stoned to find the remote or get up and put in a movie.sat there smoking and laughing passed out with the pipe in my hand.woke up 9 hours later still in a sitting position with the pipe still in my hand.great for insomnia.not for first timers.â€

â€œAfghan kush is a very strong high and kind of catches you by surprise if you are not prepared. Being the fact that it is a kush gives it points on the potency chart anyway but other than that this strain is extremely potent rating a 19% to 22% Thc content. This strain gives an extreme body high would be strongly recommended for experts not for novices because those who are not prepared or have never had anything this...â€
â€œgood for backpain man loved it manâ€
â€œthis afghan kush is incredible, one of the most potent strains I've EVER had, after just a normal dose" of one small joint I was feeling real good for hrs
column6: it also made me very very relaxed
column7: sleepy and as if I didnt have a care in the world...â€"

column3: â€œThis weed brought me back to a peaceful time, before September 11th, 1985â€

â€œA great strain to kickback with your friends and converse about life. Little to no paranoia. Not harsh on the lungs and is a great strain to roll into a joint. Beginners should be careful however, it is a very heavy strain and 2-3 hits will do you good.â€
â€œThis indica is true with the indica traits. Horney. Hungry.  Sleepy. Even the head spins are foggy, tight around the cerebral with a low and heavy feeling. Shizits no joke. I love it.â€
â€œAfter noon  high with the Afghan and she got me feeling ssslllleeeeepppppyyyyyy... and relaxed. A bit aroused too I might add. Oh and hungry too.â€

â€œI'm mostly an Indica kind of guy, so naturally something like this is right up my alley. I've tried it once from Colorado, and once from California. Both times I absolutely loved it.

For people with a lower tolerance, this is definitely a hit it and quit it" type strain. Zero raciness whatsoever
column4: and your whole body from head to toe just gets engulfed in this almost dream-like state of relaxation and laziness. Grea...â€"

column3: â€œI will be honest when I say that I did not expect this strain to be as good as it is. I am a Sativa smoker. That is generally what I prefer. I actually thought this strain was a Sativa, (the first time I smoked it), such was the strength of the heady" high. This was absolutely one of the most potent strains I have ever partaken of. The bud itself produces more kief than any other I have grinder up. I have sworn by S...â€"
â€œThis is my favorite indica for stress hands down.  The pain relief is more like prescription ibuprofen,  but the euphoria is outstanding.  Afghan Kush is the wash away the day" strain
column4: or for spending the evening with your lover.   Substitute this for alcohol and you have a mellow
column6: relaxing way to help your mind and body cope with stress!â€"

column3: â€œI have built up a tolerance way faster than I thought I would.  Because of this, I have been searching for a med that will knock my ass out" and allow me to sleep
column4: as at times my brain doesn't want to slow down enough to allow me to relax.  Well.... HELLO AFGHAN KUSH!  This strain didn't just allow me to fall asleep
column5: this one FORCED me to go to bed!  EXACTLY what I was looking for.  Nice fresh buds were a pleasure

column3: â€œImmediate pain relief, very narcotic in effect.â€

â€œOne of my favorite strains. This strains high is very narcotic like and couch-locked me so hard. This strain definitely will give you munchies, after 3 joints and 3 bong rips me and my friends all easily ate 3 pizzas and then got put straight to sleep, Overall I would recommend this strain to help lack of appetite muscle spasms body pain insomnia and if you just want to have a good time 10/10 strain look forward to t...â€
â€œImmediate pain relief, very narcotic in effect.â€

â€œClassic indica in the best sense. Pretty heavy feeling high so if you're prone to couch-lock, this one will tie you down but if you like to get in sort of a trancey place, this will get you there.â€

â€œI remember it was a nice day after I finished my classes and I smoked a selfie l, it was about 3:30 and I walked around the corner to me friends house. I don't remember how I got there and the last thing I remember was her dad saying I was too high (she wasn't a smoker) . I laughed softly cause I was too high to do anything else. the next thing I know its 5 hours later, we are downtown in some restaurant that I never...â€

â€œGreat strain. Really good in a medical aspect, really helped with my back and neck pain, totally took away my headache as well. Very strong earthy smell slight spice smell too. The overall taste was a very strong earthy spicy flavour, really nice. Knocks you out and gives you munchies in my case. 3-4 bong hits got me baked.â€

â€œOrdered from dispensary.

I have had this strain many years ago, but this is the first time acquiring it on a medical quality. 

It tastes and smells mostly of a mildew / musty smell, with a slight mango hint, personally rather enjoyable but not the best. The smoke is dense and pretty harsh, but this bud burns incredibly well. Immediately you feel some effects, but it seems to creep upon you within 20 minutes for...â€

â€œAbout half way through the first bowl hit had already start to hit with a kinda jumpy, energetic type high; takes about 45 min-1 hour to start to come down from the high then it's  a good relaxed feeling for about another hour and a half, good for late in the evening. Taste: more pine and woody taste; did taste a little earthy. An overall good strain, would recommend for anyone dealing with stress, depression, muscle...â€

â€œA classic indica couch stone. Great for pain and passing time. High focus makes mundane tasks more interesting. Good for very chill activities like watching a movie, going for a walk, or doing repetitive lightweight chores. You can get pretty baked and  still have a good experience with this stuff. Tried from two different growers and the general experience was consistent.â€

â€œAfghan Kush just lives up to its reputation. When I'm around friends I become very talkative. One down side is that this strain is one of the most effective strains at reducing my short term memory down to the point where whatever is the shiniest" thing in the room is usually gets my full attention. Its body and especially head buzz is great
column5: but last for a long time... Some times feels like it intens...â€"

column3: â€œA classic indica couch stone. Great for pain and passing time. High focus makes mundane tasks more interesting. â€œVery good for work and school, I was in my Math class and I was focused on the teacher`s voice. I finish my homework in my class and I was pretty calm all the time, it`s an outstanding kind for people with ADD/ADHD cause you are very focused and you feel ready to work. I was very surprise because Afghan kush is Indica, and I feel like sativa because I was motivate at school with that kind.â€
â€œThis is a great strain for ADHD it had me very relaxed it was long lasting.  I got some good rest and i dont usually sleep much but with this strain i was glued to the bed.â€
â€œThis is my kind of weed. Heavy indica which makes my eyelids heavy and sends a sensation of fog to my head to nest between my temples... Makes you hungry too. Love these Indicas.â€

â€œHit the chillum with the AK. This shit is ridiculous. The high is heavy (Get that damned blanket off me) and dampening... and I like it. Don't feel like dancing, but I could have a high talk session while melting into somebodies leather couch. Nice high or should I say a low".â€"

â€œReal indica chill. Girlfriend didn't know I was high (I'd vaped about a gram) before seeing her. She was in a shitty mood and kept picking fights. I was on a whole new level of chill and I just happily fixed all of the problems she was venting about. Early night with a smile. Munchies nearly got me busted though ha haâ€
â€œnice body buzz, makes you extremely happy/euphoric. Smoked with my best friend, had the best night everâ€

â€œGood high, nugs are light green and fluffy. makes you euphoric but very tired and gives you the munchies. Would recommend smoking this at night and not when you have to do something or in the middle of the day.â€

â€œHigh:great strain for anyone with any type of sleep disorder. It has a little bit of a creep to it, but an hour in the yawns start to come on quite frequently, if you lay down , you WILL go to sleep. In fact due to when i prefer to smoke indicas it was hard to stay awake long enough to even tell i was high anymore. Deffenetly a knock out indica.
taste:was slightly kushy , peppery undertones. with a little skunk funk...â€

â€œExtremely dry tasting very skunk like it smells of fruit, this #3 kino type still makes me dizzy but even though the vape is harsh and thick it's the relaxing indica part that grabs me able to stretch and sit down to get locks of things done. Dark hazy yellow ish dust covering these leafs great for couch lock if you do too much. It's best to treat insomnia, Any hard pain issues, ADHD, and appetite loss great for anor...â€
â€œwould have to put this in my top 5 all time. The impact is not fully felt till around 5-10 after smoking. Very HEAVY BODY HIGH ON TOP OF POWERFUL HEAD BUZZâ€

â€œI am a chronic pain and chronic migraine patient, and this strain definitely helped. I also suffer from insomnia and anxiety. Best and most peaceful night of sleep in awhile. This strain gave me wicked giggles and wicked munchies.â€

â€œUnderstand this. This a not a strain for novice users. Having said that a novice user must try it, one hit will do it for you.. Anymore than that I wouldn't recommend. Now for veteran smokers enjoy its a hell of a high very hash like the name says it all. 
PTSD- Since my reviews are centered around my PTSD, this will calm your symptoms it'll put you at super ease a little goes a long way with this. I recommend this s...â€
â€œnice body buzz, makes you extremely happy/euphoric. Smoked with my best friend, had the best night everâ€
â€œIt was hard for me to write review for this strain as I always was too lazy to do it. Also, I always forget to stick a label Sedative. Do not operate heavy machinery" to the jar with Afghan Kush.

â€œvery potent but good, relaxing, sleepy high. can give you the spins if youre not careful.â€
â€œPretty dank stuff. Perfect for lazy days or before u go to bed. Probably not something u should smoke on ur lunch break. ğŸ˜‚â€
â€œrather tasty buds are very nice a bit darker than I like but very good so very passableâ€
â€œvery good smoke smooth , relaxed and ready to hit the hay at any time ,also very potent and loaded with thc would highly recommend to anyoneâ€

â€œVery relaxing strain. Soothes the body with muscle relaxant like effects while easing the mind nicely. This strain also helped mellow out anxiety experience from a previously consumed strain. Nice!â€

â€œthis was a very good strain. I bought 10 grams and couldn't be more pleased. it does keep me on my ass though which makes meditation a long lasting beautiful dream. I really felt at ease all day. at times I found myself in a giggly mood. the munchies weren't that bad for me honestly it was kind of mind over matter.  I am thinking of switching to a sativa though as I craved the energy at times to just go for my usual ...â€
â€œI love this strain and the relaxation it gives offâ€
â€œIt makes me feel creative. It is good to try, a common name and a good choice. :)â€

â€œA good strain for the evening if consumed in moderate ammounts. Bin Laden Kush as its also called, will kick in relatively slowly at first but then will hit hard. This strain is really bad if youre trying to focus. I recommend this if you just wanna feel care free and if you dont have any tasks at hand. Overall a very good strain for weekend afternoons.â€
â€œLove this Strain, I have bad insomnia and this helps me pass out early and gets me through the whole nightâ€
â€œProbably one of my favorite strains. It's what I call a good old-fashioned high. Happy hungry relaxed and gigging out lol.â€
â€œSuch a good strain. Mellows you out and makes you giggle. Great for anyone with anxiety.â€
â€œBest I've had, trailing GSC. Tastes of flowers and dandelions on a toasted spring morning.  Laughs outweigh fatigue.â€

â€œVery strong indica. I dont smoke as often as Iuse to and tried this to get a good sleep. ended up keeping me awake a bit longer then i wanted to be. i got a pretty outrageous cough and dry mouth that i couldnt shake. Next time id smoke it a few hours before going to bed give myself time to reach that sleepy stage in the high. I didnt get any anxiety but i could see some people reacting to the initial hit a bit worse ...â€

â€œGot the seeds from World Of Seeds, grown under LED, hydroponics DWC, Palgron only nutrients-my fav indica strain, heavy body effect, great smell and taste :) put some guys to sleep :) nice yield too 192g/1plantâ€
â€œMind opening while relaxing. If you like Banana Kush, you will like this.â€
â€œFuck this bud makes me feel so numb, spark a bowl and ten minutes later my face is melting holy shit lol and I couldn't stop laughing for like an hour straightâ€

â€œKnocking the shit out of me, pretty good taste, pretty harsh smoke, a bit irritating. But still knocking me to sleep. Cant really focus on this Venom movie review. I am a bit depressive thinking about my future. Goals being reached or not...pretty good sad strain i dont know what im saying.â€
â€œThis strain put me on my ass now I'm stuck playin dragon ball : xenoverseâ€
â€œGreat for chillingâ€
â€œBest when rolled in a blunt, good strain but I've found you really need to get this strain hotâ€

â€œOnly been smoking around 2 years but this strain has definitely been the most potent for me. I'm a bong smoker and after about 2 decent hits you're knocked out for hours tripping hard and zoning out constantly. Can get super dizzy too if you're not careful, even for experienced smokers. This is the only strain that I've almost thrown up from but t I wouldn't worry about that. Once you get past the initial shock of ho...â€
â€œDefinitely relaxingâ€

â€œI personally don't enjoy couch-locking strains. Does not really give you a head high, but a body buzz. Very good strain for relaxing before going to sleep, not very good for socializing. 
Oh and it will give you ridiculous munchiesâ€
